patthana16.60:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naāsavasampayutto
patthana16.60:1.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana16.60:1.1_2: nasanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ
patthana16.60:1.1_3: āsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavasampayutto ca naanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana16.60:1.1_4: naāsavasampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe
patthana16.60:2.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
